long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Prison Struggle plus,
Allows you to move between Prisons and also invite multiple users to your boss fights.
 simple additions to the game. Please let me know if you would like me to add more features, enjoy! (For the game prisonstruggle.com)
